member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Build.Tools.ErrorDescriptionGenerator.Generate(JetBrains.ReSharper.Build.Tools.WorkMode,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Does all the useful sorta things.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Build.Tools.ErrorsGenTaskStub
member.summary:
Generates source code definitions from the Errors.xml files. This complies with the ProxyToSolutionCompiledTask calling convention.
Expected parameters (task items with metadata ParameterName equal to these): • Inputs, multiple input files to process. Metadata: • • FullPath — full path to the input file. • • OutputFile — full path to the output file. • • Mode — . • • LangMacro — macro to replace with language name. • • Namespace — NS to put generated files into.
This complies with the ProxyToSolutionCompiledTask calling convention.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Build.Tools.QuickFixRegistrarComponent.Registration.MakeUpperCamelCaseName(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the name from lowerCamelCase or MixedCAMELCase or dashed-words or underscored_words into the UpperCamelCase format.
